department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This project is about purchasing a row crop planter for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada,
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3756846589 (Doc3772069608) dated December 7, 2022 with a closing of December 22, 2022 at 1400 EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. \\
duration_in_months: First month of February to last month of February 24 months
